properties.tagline: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a Super-Soldier serum. But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.
properties.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
